title: Marianne Williamson and Dr. Gerald Horne on Protests, Dems' Failures, and 2020
description:
Matt and Katie briefly discuss a few moments from the past week, including Trump's praise of 'dominating' the protests, then Historian Dr. Gerald Horne discusses the history of racism in the US and contextualizes current issues, followed by Marianne Williamson on intersectional issues and the 2020 election
